Key Match Events: Nikola Jovic made the tying layup and go-ahead foul shot with 7.8 seconds left to send the Miami Heat past the Minnesota Timberwolves 95-94
Miscellaneous Highlights: The NBA announced that Thursday night's matchup between the Lakers and Hornets has been postponed due to the ongoing wildfires in Los Angeles
Others: Tyler Herro had 26 points for the Heat, who played without star Jimmy Butler
Anthony Edwards scored 22 points on 8-for-24 shooting for the Wolves
Naz Reid, who went 4 for 7 from deep, hit a 3-pointer late in the third quarter to put the Timberwolves up 64-63 for their first lead since 10-9
